response_requirements.initial_response_description: Executive agencies must acknowledge receipt within 3 business days
response_requirements.final_response_notes: 15 business days for standard requests (under 8 hours work); 45 business days for time-intensive requests
response_requirements.extension_notes: For time-intensive requests, agencies may extend to maximum of 180 business days or 270 calendar days, whichever is shorter
response_requirements.standard_request_definition: Request estimated to take less than 8 hours (1 standard working day)
response_requirements.time_intensive_request_definition: Request requiring more than 8 hours to complete

fee_structure.search_fee: Reasonable fee allowed, not exceeding actual cost of reproduction
fee_structure.search_fee_notes: Reasonable fee may be charged by the responsible officer/employee
fee_structure.copy_fee_notes: Not to exceed $1.00 per page for first 50 pages; $0.50 per page for pages over 50
fee_structure.electronic_fee: Actual cost of producing copies, but not more than fee for hard copies
fee_structure.prepayment_notes: Executive agencies must require payment before providing substantive response to time-intensive requests; may require payment for standard requests

exemptions.description: Records whose disclosure would constitute an unwarranted invasion of personal privacy
Medical records, patient records, records containing medical information, or records of Medicaid recipients
Registration, circulation records, and information concerning use of public, school, or university libraries
Security plans, procedures, assessments, measures, or systems
Banking records, tax and financial statements

appeal_process.first_level_notes: Alabama does not provide for administrative appeals
appeal_process.second_level_deadline_notes: Must file within 2 years of denial date
appeal_process.attorney_fees_notes: Statute does not specify attorney fee recovery provisions
appeal_process.judicial_remedy: Court order requiring agency to produce records

requester_requirements.residency_notes: Only Alabama residents (including Alabama-based companies and organizations) may request records
requester_requirements.specific_format: Request must identify the public writing sought

agency_obligations.records_officer_title: Public officer or employee responsible for records
agency_obligations.business_hours_notes: Records available for inspection during business hours
agency_obligations.redaction_requirements: Must redact exempt portions; provide non-exempt portions
agency_obligations.record_maintenance: Public officers must correctly make and accurately keep all books, documents, files, papers, and letters providing full detailed information

oversight_body.notes: No central oversight body; enforcement through court system

official_resources.request_portal_notes: Individual agencies may maintain their own request systems

validation_metadata.verification_notes: All fields verified from statutory text. Alabama has specific response timelines for executive agencies only (3 days acknowledgment, 15 days for standard requests, 45 days for time-intensive). Residency requirement limits access to Alabama residents. No administrative appeal; only judicial remedy available within 2 years.
unique_characteristics: Two-tier response system (standard vs time-intensive requests)
Specific response timelines apply only to executive agencies
